src: Въпреки че повечето други страни и ООН не признават Йерусалим за столица, той е столицата и най-големият град на Израел. Древният град в Юдейските хълмове има очарователна история, обхващаща хиляди години. Градът е свещен за трите основни религии - юдеизъм, християнство и ислям, и служи като духовен, религиозен и културен център. Поради религиозното значение на града, и по-специално на многобройните забележителности в района на Стария град, Йерусалим е една от основните туристически дестинации в Израел. Заедно с оживени и претъпкани търговски центрове, кафенета и ресторанти Йерусалим има много исторически, археологически и културни обекти.
mt: Despite most other countries and the UN not recognizing Jerusalem as capital, it is the capital and largest city of Israel. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has an enchanting history spanning thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three major religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and especially the numerous landmarks in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Along with bustling and crowded shopping centers, cafes and restaurants Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Националният парк Крюгер (KNP) се намира в североизточната част на Южна Африка и се простира на изток по протежение на границата с Мозамбик, на север е Зимбабве, а река Крокодил е южната му граница. Паркът се простира на 19 500 км², разделени на 14 отделни екозони, във всяка от които има различна дива природа. Представлява една от основните атракции на Южна Африка и се счита за водещият от Националните паркове на Южна Африка (SANParks). Обикновено всички южноафрикански национални паркове изискват дневни такси за вход и консервация на парка. Също така може да е от полза да си купите Wild Card, която предоставя достъп или до избрани паркове в Южна Африка, или до всички южнафрикански национални паркове.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa and stretches east along the border with Mozambique, north is Zimbabwe, and the Crocodile River is its southern border. The park covers 19 500 km², divided into 14 separate ecozones, each of which has different wild nature. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is considered the leading of the National Parks of South Africa (SANParks). Usually all South African national parks require daily entrance fees and conservation of the park. It may also be useful to buy Wild Card, which provides access or to selected parks in South Africa, or to all South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

Също така може да е от полза да си купите Wild Card, която предоставя достъп или до избрани паркове в Южна Африка, или до всички южнафрикански национални паркове.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa and stretches east along the border with Mozambique, north is Zimbabwe, and the Crocodile River is its southern border. The park covers 19 500 km², divided into 14 separate ecozones, each of which has different wild nature. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is considered the leading of the National Parks of South Africa (SANParks). Usually all South African national parks require daily entrance fees and conservation of the park. It may also be useful to buy Wild Card, which provides access or to selected parks in South Africa, or to all South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Тази стръмна планина, често използвана за фон на много снимки на руините, се извисява над северния край на Мачу Пикчу. Повечето разумно годни хора би трябвало да успеят за около 45 минути, въпреки че изглежда малко плашещо отдолу и е стръмно и трудно изкачване. Каменните стъпала са разположени по протежение на по - голямата част от пътя, а по-стръмните отсечки са с осигурени парапети от стоманени кабели. Това речено, очаквай да бъдеш без дъх, и внимавай в по-стръмни места, особено когато е мокро, тъй като бързо може да стане опасно. Близо до върха има малка пещера, през която трябва да се премине. Доста е ниско и тясно.
mt: This steep mountain, often used as a backdrop in many photos of the ruins, rises above the northern end of Machu Picchu. Most reasonably fit people should be able to do it in about 45 minutes, despite looking a little scary from below and being steep and difficult to climb. The stone steps are located along most of the path, and the steeper sections have steel handrails made of steel cables. Said that, expect to be out of breath, and be careful in steeper sections, especially when wet, as it can quickly become dangerous. Near the top there is a small cave that needs to be passed through. It is quite low and narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Като в подобни зони в Средиземно море, Майорканската кухня се основава на хляб, зеленчуци и месо (особено свинско), и използва зехтин навсякъде. Семпла популярна вечеря, особено през лятото, е „па амб оли“: хляб със зехтин, домати и всеки наличен продукт като сирене, риба тон и т.н.
mt: As in similar zones in the Mediterranean, Majorcan cuisine is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and uses olive oil everywhere. A popular evening meal, especially in summer, is "pa amb oli": bread with olive oil, tomatoes and any available product such as cheese, tuna fish and so on.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Традиционното ястие ханги се готви в нагорещена яма в земята. Ямата се нагрява или с нагорещени в огън камъни, или някъде геотермалната топлина прави земята естествено гореща. Ханги се използва често при приготвянето на традиционно печено за вечеря. Геотермални ханджи предлагат на няколко места в Роторуа, докато други ханджи могат да бъдат изпробвани в Крайстчърч, Уелингтън и другаде.
mt: The traditional food hāngi is cooked in a heated pit in the ground. The pit is heated either with heated rocks in a fire, or geothermal heat makes the ground naturally hot. Hāngi is often used in the preparation of traditional roast for dinner. Geothermal hāngi are offered at several places in Rotorua, while other hāngi can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: По време на посещението си в манастирите жените са задължени да носят поли под коленете, като раменете им също трябва да са покрити. Повечето манастири осигуряват наметки за жени, които идват неподготвени, но ако донесете своя собствена, особено с ярки цветове, ще получите усмивка от монаха или монахинята още на входа. По същата логика мъжете трябва да носят панталони, покриващи коленете. Облеклото може да бъде взето назаем от наличното на входа, но то не се пере след всеки потребител, така че може да не се чувствате комфортно, носейки тези поли. Един размер е подходящ за всички мъже!
mt: During their visit to the monasteries, women are required to wear a skirt below the knees, while their shoulders must also be covered. Most monasteries provide scarves for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially in bright colors, you will receive a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. For the same reason, men must wear pants covering the knees. The clothing can be borrowed from the available at the entrance, but it is not washed after each user, so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Ако посетите областите на Арктика или Антарктика през зимата, ще преживеете полярната нощ, което означава, че Слънцето не се издига над хоризонта. Това предлага добра възможност да се види Северното сияние, тъй като небето ще бъде тъмно почти денонощно. Тъй като зоните са слабо населени и, следователно, слабото замърсяване често не е проблем, вие също ще можете да се насладите на звездите.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic regions during the winter, you will experience polar night, which means the Sun does not rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Northern Lights, as the sky will be dark almost all night. Since the regions are sparsely populated and, therefore, the light pollution is not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: На отдалечени места, без покритие от мобилен телефон, единствената ви възможност може да бъде сателитен телефон. Сателитният телефон като цяло не замества мобилния телефон, тъй като трябва да сте на открито и с пряка видимост към сателита, за да можете да проведете телефонно обаждане. Услугата често се използва от корабоплаването, включително от плавателни съдове за развлечение, както и от експедиции, които имат нужда от дистанционни данни и гласови данни. Повече информация за свързване с тази услуга може да се даде от вашият местен доставчик на телефонни услуги.
mt: In remote areas, without mobile phone coverage, your only option may be a satellite phone. A satellite phone does not replace a mobile phone, as you need to be outdoors and in direct line of sight to a satellite to make a phone call. The service is often used by shipping, including cruise ships, as well as expeditions that need remote data and voice data. More information on connecting to this service can be provided by your local phone service provider.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Кишинев е столицата на Молдова. Местният език е румънски, но руският е с широка употреба. Молдова е многоетническа република, страдаща от етнически конфликти. През 1994 г. този конфликт води до отделянето на самопровъзгласилата се Приднестровска молдовска република, която, макар със собствено правителство и собствена валута, не е призната от никоя държава-членка на ООН. Въпреки провала на политическите преговори, икономическите връзки между тези две части на Молдова бяха възстановени. Православното християнство е основната религия в Молдова.
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multiethnic republic, suffering from ethnic conflicts. In 1994, this conflict led to the secession of the self-proclaimed Pridnestrovian Moldovan Republic, which, although with its own government and its own currency, is not recognized by any member state of the UN. Despite the failure of political negotiations, economic ties between these two parts of Moldova were restored. Orthodox Christianity is the main religion in Moldova.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Тъй като Монтевидео се намира на юг от екватора, там е лято, когато в Северното полукълбо е зима, и обратно. Монтевидео е в субтропичната област; през летните месеци са нормални температури над +30 °C. Зимата може да е измамно студена: температурите рядко падат под нулата, но комбинираните вятър и влага водят до усещане за по-студено отколкото показва термометърът. Няма специални „дъждовни“ и „сухи“ сезони: през цялата година количеството дъждове остава приблизително еднакво.
mt: Because Montevideo is south of the equator, it is summer when the Northern Hemisphere is in winter, and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropical zone; summer temperatures are normal above +30 °C. Winter can be surprisingly cold: temperatures rarely fall below zero, but combined wind and humidity make it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There are no special "rainy" and "dry" seasons: rainfall is approximately the same throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Тъй като Монтевидео се намира на юг от екватора, там е лято, когато в Северното полукълбо е зима, и обратно. src: Нежеланите рисунки по стените или драсканици са познати като графити. Макар да е далеч от модерен феномен, повечето хора вероятно го свързват с младежки вандализъм над публична и частна собственост, използвайки спрей боя. В днешно време обаче има установени художници на графити, събития, свързани с графити и „законни“ стени. В този контекст Графитите, в този контекст, често приличат на произведения на изкуството, отколкото на нечетливи етикети.
mt: Unwanted drawings on walls or chalkboards are known as graffiti. While far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with teenage vandalism on public and private property, using spray paint. In today's context, however, there are established graffiti artists, events related to graffiti and "legal" walls. In this context, graffiti often resemble works of art, rather than illegible tags.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: На някои музикални фестивали огромно мнозинство от участниците решава да лагерува на територията на фестивала и повечето участници го считат за жизненоважна част от преживяването. Ако искате да сте близо до събитието, ще трябва да отидете по-рано, за да получите място за къмпинг близо до музиката. Помнете, че въпреки че музиката на основните сцени може да е приключила, може да има фестивални сцени, на които ще продължи да се свири до късно през нощта. Някои фестивали предлагат специални места за къмпинг за семейства с малки деца.
mt: At some music festivals, a large majority of participants decide to camp on the festival grounds and most participants consider it an essential part of the experience. If you want to be close to the event, you will need to go earlier to get a spot for camping near the music. Remember that although the music on the main stages may have ended, there may be festival stages where the music will continue to play late into the night. Some festivals offer special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: На някои музикални фестивали огромно мнозинство от участниците решава да лагерува на територията на фестивала и повечето участници го считат за жизненоважна част от преживяването. Ако искате да сте близо до събитието, ще трябва да отидете по-рано, за да получите място за къмпинг близо до музиката. Помнете, че въпреки че музиката на основните сцени може да е приключила, може да има фестивални сцени, на които ще продължи да се свири до късно през нощта. Някои фестивали предлагат специални места за къмпинг за семейства с малки деца.

src: Като се има предвид колко отдалечени са пуеблосите, няма да можете да намерите интензивен нощен живот, без да пътувате до Албакърки или Санта Фе. Все пак почти всички казина, изброени по-горе, сервират напитки, а няколко от тях предлагат забавления с маркови имена (най-вече големите, които са в непосредствена близост до Албъкърки и Санта Фе). Пазете се: баровете в малките градове тук невинаги са добри места за размотаване на посетители, които не са от този щат. От една страна, в Северно Ню Мексико съществуват сериозни проблеми с шофирането в нетрезво състояние, а концентрацията на пияни шофьори в близост до баровете в малките градове е висока.
mt: As the pueblos are so far apart, you won't find an intense nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, almost all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and a few of them offer entertainment with big-name acts (mostly the larger ones that are close to Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: the bars in the small towns here are not always good places for visitors who are not from this state to unwind. On one hand, there are serious problems with drunk driving in Northern New Mexico, and the concentration of drunk drivers around the bars in the small towns is high.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Основната местна бира е „Номер едно“. Тя не е тежка бира, а е приятна и освежаваща. „Манта“ е названието на другата местна бира. Има много френски вина за проба, но новозеландски и австралийски може да преминават по - добре. Местната чешмяна вода е напълно безопасна за консумация, но бутилирана вода лесно се намира, ако ви е страх. Идеята за „плоско бяло“ кафе е чужда за австралийците. Късото черно е „еспресо“, капучиното е отрупано догоре със сметана (не пяна), а чаят се сервира без мляко. Горещият шоколад отговаря на стандарта за белгийски. Плодовите сокове са скъпички, но прекрасни.
mt: The main local beer is "Number One". It is not a heavy beer, but is pleasant and refreshing. "Manta" is the name of another local beer. There are many French wines to try, but New Zealand and Australian wines can pass better. The local spring water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easily found if you are worried. The idea of "flat white" coffee is foreign to Australians. Short black is "espresso", capuccino is topped with cream (not milk), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate meets the standard for Belgian. Fruit juices are pricey, but beautiful.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Гуарани са били най-значимото местно племе, чийто представители обитавали днешния Източен Парагвай, живеейки като полуномадски ловджии, практикуващи също земеделие за прехрана. Регионът на Чако е дом на други групи от местни племена, например Гуайкуру и Паягуа, които са оцелявали с лов, събиране на плодове и риболов. Парагвай, преди наричан „Гигантската провинция на Индия“, е роден през 16-ти век в резултат на срещата на испанските завоеватели с местните групи. Испанците започнали колонизационния период, който продължил три века. Парагвай успял да запази голяма част от самобитния си характер и идентичност още от основаването на Асунсион през 1537 г.
mt: Guarani were the most significant local tribe whose members inhabited present-day Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers, also practicing agriculture for sustenance. The Chaco region is home to other groups of local tribes, such as Guaykurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, fruit gathering and fishing. Paraguay, formerly called the "Giant Province of India", was born in the 16th century as a result of the meeting of Spanish conquerors with local groups. The Spanish began the colonization period, which lasted three centuries. Paraguay managed to preserve a large part of its autonomous character and identity since the founding of Asunción in 1537.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Парижаните са с репутация, че са егоцентрични, груби и арогантни хора. Въпреки че това често е само неточен стереотип, най-добрият начин да се ориентирате в Париж все още е като спазвате добро поведение и се държите с поведение от типа ""bien élevé"" (добре възпитан). Това значително ще улесни обиколката ви. Троснатият външен вид на парижаните бързо ще се изпари, ако покажете малко учтивост."
mt: "Parisians have a reputation for being self-centered, rude and arrogant people. While this is often just an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to navigate Paris is still by following good manners and behaving in a manner of "bien élevé" (well-bred). This will greatly ease your visit. The surly exterior of Parisians will quickly disappear if you show a little courtesy."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: В MetroRail пътнически влакове във и около Кейптаун имат две класи: MetroPlus (наричани също „първа класа“) и Metro (наричани „трета класа“). MetroPlus е по - комфортен и с по - малко навалица, но малко по - скъп, макар и все пак по - евтин от нормалните билети за метрото в Европа. Във всеки влак има както MetroPlus, така и Metro вагони; MetroPlus вагоните са разположени винаги в този край на влака, който е най-близо до Кейптаун.
mt: MetroRail trains in and around Cape Town have two classes: MetroPlus (also called "first class") and Metro (also called "third class"). MetroPlus is more comfortable and has less crush, but is slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro fares in Europe. In each train there are both MetroPlus and Metro carriages; MetroPlus carriages are always located in the end of the train which is closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Пътуващите могат да срещнат животни вредители, които не са им познати от родните места. Вредителите могат да развалят храната, да причинят дразнене или в най - лошия случай да причинят алергични реакции, да разпространят отрова или да предадат инфекции. Инфекциозните болести или опасни животни сами по себе си, които могат да наранят или убият хора със сила, обикновено не се квалифицират като вредители.
mt: Travelers may encounter pests that are not native to their home areas. Pests can spoil food, cause discomfort or, in the worst case, cause allergic reactions, spread toxins or transmit diseases. Infectious diseases or dangerous animals themselves, which can injure or kill people with force, are generally not classified as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Всеки квартален магазин е препълнен с объркващ избор от предплатени телефонни карти, които са подходящи за употреба както от улични телефони, така и с обикновени телефони. Въпреки че повечето карти могат да бъдат набрани навсякъде, някои специално предоставят изгодни тарифи за обаждания за конкретни групи държави. Тези услуги често са достъпни чрез безплатен телефонен номер, с който повечето телефони могат да се свържат безплатно.
mt: Every corner store is filled with a bewildering array of prepaid phone cards, which can be used both by pay phones and ordinary phones. While most cards can be dialed anywhere, some specially offer cheap rates for calls to specific groups of countries. These services are often available through a free phone number, which most phones can be dialed for free.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Националният парк „Плитвишки езера“ е с гъсти гори, предимно от бук, смърч и ела със смесена алпийска и средиземноморска растителност. Поради разнообразието от микроклимат, различни почви и различни нива на надморска височина, има изключително голямо разнообразие от растителни съобщества. Областта също е приютила изключително много различни видове животни и птици. Там могат да се видят редки видове фауна, като Европейската кафява мечка, вълк, орел, бухал, рис, дива котка и глухар, заедно с много други често срещани видове
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is covered by dense forests, mainly beech, fir and spruce with a mixed alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. Due to the diversity of microclimate, different soils and different altitudes, there is an exceptionally large variety of plant communities. The area has also sheltered an exceptionally large number of different animal and bird species. Rare species of fauna such as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, vulture, otter, wildcat, and capercaillie, along with many other common species can be found there.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Медийните компании редовно лъжат за целта му, като твърдят, че тя е „предотвратяване на пиратството“. Всъщност регионалните кодове нямат абсолютно никакъв ефект върху незаконното копиране; малко по малко копие на диск ще се възпроизведе добре на всяко устройство, където е оригинална. Реалната цел е да се даде на тези компании повече контрол над техните пазари; става дума за въртене на пари.
mt: Media companies routinely lie about its purpose, claiming it is "preventing piracy". In fact, regional codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a few more copies of a disc will be made well on any device where the original is. The real purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's about turning money.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Медийните компании редовно лъжат за целта му, като твърдят, че тя е „предотвратяване на пиратството“. Всъщност регионалните кодове нямат абсолютно никакъв ефект върху незаконното копиране; малко по малко копие на диск ще се възпроизведе добре на всяко устройство, където е оригинална. Реалната цел е да се даде на тези компании повече контрол над техните пазари; става дума за въртене на пари.
mt: Media companies routinely lie about its purpose, claiming it is "preventing piracy". In fact, regional codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a few more copies of a disc will be made well on any device where the original is. The real purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's about turning money.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Докато имиграционната проверка при пристигане в родината обикновено липсва или е формалност, митническият контрол може да бъде проблем. Уверете се, че знаете какво можете и какво не можете да внесете и декларирайте всичко извън разрешеното от закона.
mt: While immigration checks on arrival in the country are usually absent or a formality, customs control can be a problem. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare everything outside the law.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Долината Кочамо - най-добрата дестинация за катерачи в Чили, известна като южноамериканския Йосемити, с изобилие от големи гранитни стени и канари. Билата включват спиращи дъха гледки от върховете. Алпинисти от всички краища на света непрекъснато изграждат нови маршрути сред безкрайния потенциал на стените.
mt: The Cochamo Valley is the best destination for climbers in Chile, known as the South American Yosemite, with an abundance of large granite walls and canyons. The routes include breathtaking views from the tops. Climbers from all corners of the world continuously establish new routes among the endless potential of the walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Ако искате да летите около света изцяло само в южното полукълбо, изборът на полети и дестинации е ограничен, тъй като няма презокеански маршрути. Нито един съюз на авиосъюз не обхваща пресечните точки на трите океана в Южното полукълбо (SkyTeam не покрива нито една от пресечните точки). Star Alliance, обаче, покрива целия район с изключение на източната част на Южен Тихи океан - от Сантяго де Чиле до Таити, където лети авиолинията LATAM Oneworld. Ако искате да пропуснете Южния Тихи океан и западния бряг на Южна Америка, този полет не е единствената възможност. (вижте по-долу)
mt: If you want to fly around the world entirely in the southern hemisphere, your choice of flights and destinations is limited, as there are no transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers the three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (SkyTeam does not cover any of the ocean crossings). However, Star Alliance covers the entire region except for the eastern part of the South Pacific Ocean - from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, where LATAM flies. If you want to skip the South Pacific Ocean and the western coast of South America, this flight is not the only option. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: По света работят близо 200 туристически организации. По-голямата част от тях работят независимо. Наследникът на Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours мрежи от десетки доставчици на пътувания за разглеждане на забележителности на четири континента. С начало от Running Tours Barcelona в Барселона и Copenhagen's Running в Копенхаген, към него бързо се присъединяват Running Tours Prague със седалище в Прага и други.
mt: 200+ tourism companies are working around the world. Most of them work independently. The successor of Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours networks of dozens of travel providers for sightseeing on four continents. Starting from Running Tours Barcelona in Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running in Copenhagen, Prague's Running Tours Prague quickly joined and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Сафаритата може би представляват най-голям туристически интерес в Африка и са крайна цел за много посетители. Терминът „сафари“ в популярната си употреба реферира към пътуване по суша за разглеждане на изумителната африканска дива природа, по-конкретно в саваната. Някои животни, като слонове и жирафи, са склонни да се доближават повече до колите и се получава добър изглед със стандартно оборудване. Понякога лъвовете, гепардите и леопардите са срамежливи и се наблюдават по-добре с бинокъл. Пешеходното сафари (наричано още ""разходка в пустошта"", ""туристическо сафари"" или ""ходене пеша"") представлява разходка с продължителност няколко часа или няколко дни."
mt: "Safaris may be the most popular tourist attraction in Africa and are the ultimate goal for many visitors. The term "safari" in its popular usage refers to traveling by land to view the amazing African wild, specifically in the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, are inclined to approach the cars and a good view is obtained with standard equipment. Sometimes lions, cheetahs and leopards are shy and are better viewed with binoculars. The walking safari (also called "strolling in the desert", "tourist safari" or "walking") is a walk of several hours or several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Обиколките са по-изгодни за по-големи групи, така че ако пътувате сами или само с един приятел, опитайте да се запознаете с други хора и да съберете група от четири до шест души за по-добра цена на човек. Това обаче не трябва реално да бъде извън загрижеността ви, защото често туристите се разместват наоколо, за да напълнят колите. Всъщност изглежда повече като начин да излъжеш хората да смятат, че трябва да платят повече.
mt: Circuits are more advantageous for larger groups, so if you are traveling alone or just with one friend, try to meet other people and gather a group of four to six people for a better price per person. This, however, should not really be out of your concern, because tourists often move around to fill the cars. In fact, it looks more like a way to fool people to think they should pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: И докато икономиката на Сан Франциско е свързвана с факта, че той е туристическа атракция от световна класа, тази икономика е диверсифицирана. Най - големите сектори на заетостта са професионалните услуги, правителството, финансите, търговията и туризма. Честото представяне на града в музика, филми, литература и популярна култура, направи него и забележителностите му известни в цял свят. Сан Франциско е развил голяма туристическа инфраструктура с множество хотели, ресторанти и съоръжения за конвенции от най-висок клас. Също едно от най-добрите места в страната за друга азиатска кухня - корейска, тайландска, индийска и японска - е Сан Франциско.
mt: While the economy of San Francisco is associated with the fact that it is a tourist attraction of world class, this economy is diversified. The largest sectors of employment are professional services, government, finance, trade and tourism. The frequent representation of the city in music, films, literature and popular culture made it and its attractions known worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants and convention facilities of the highest class. It is also one of the best places in the country for another Asian cuisine - Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese - is San Francisco.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Резервирането предварително осигурява спокойствие за пътника, че ще има къде да преспи, когато пристигне в местоназначението си. Туристическите агенти често имат договорки с определени хотели, въпреки че може да намерите и други начини на настаняване, като къмпинги, чрез туристически агент. Туристическите агенции често предлагат пакети с включени закуска, транспорт от/до летището или дори комбинирани пакети самолет и хотел. Могат също така да запазят резервацията ви, ако се нуждаете от време да обмислите офертата или да си извадите други документи за дестинацията си (напр. виза). Въпреки това, всякакви изменения или заявки трябва да се насочат първо към туристическия агент, а не директно към хотела.
mt: Reserving a room in advance ensures the traveler will have a place to stay when arriving at the destination. Tourist agencies often have contracts with certain hotels, although you can also find other ways of accommodation, such as camping, through a tourist agency. Tourist agencies often offer packages with breakfast included, transportation to/from the airport or even combined plane and hotel packages. They can also hold your reservation if you need time to consider the offer or to get other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). However, any changes or requests should be directed first to the tourist agency, not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Приложения за текстов преводач в реално време – приложения, които могат да превеждат автоматично от един език на друг цели сегменти от текст. Някои от програмите в тази група могат дори да превеждат текстове на чужди езици върху знаци или други предмети от реалния свят, когато потребителят насочва смартфона към тях. Машинният превод се подобри драстично и сега често дава повече или по-малко верен превод (и по-рядко глупости), но трябва да се внимава тъй като още е възможно всичко да е грешно. Едно от най - известните приложения в тази категория е Google Преводач, позволяващ превод офлайн след изтегляне на желаните езикови данни.
mt: Real-time text translation applications – applications that can automatically translate entire segments of text from one language to another. Some of the programs in this group can even translate text in foreign languages onto real-world objects, when the user points their smartphone at them. Machine translation has improved dramatically and now often gives a more or less accurate translation (and sometimes nonsense), but caution should be taken as it is still possible for everything to be wrong. One of the most well-known applications in this category is Google Translate, allowing offline translation after downloading desired language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Приложения за текстов преводач в реално време – приложения, които могат да превеждат автоматично от един език на друг цели сегменти от текст. Някои от програмите в тази група могат дори да превеждат текстове на чужди езици върху знаци или други предмети от реалния свят, когато потребителят насочва смартфона към тях. Машинният превод се подобри драстично и сега често дава повече или по-малко верен превод (и по-рядко глупости), но трябва да се внимава тъй като още е възможно всичко да е грешно. Едно от най - известните приложения в тази категория е Google Преводач, позволяващ превод офлайн след изтегляне на желаните езикови данни.
mt: Real-time text translation applications – applications that can automatically translate entire segments of text from one language to another. Some of the programs in this group can even translate text in foreign languages onto real-world objects, when the user points their smartphone at them. Machine translation has improved dramatically and now often gives a more or less accurate translation (and sometimes nonsense), but caution should be taken as it is still possible for everything to be wrong. One of the most well-known applications in this category is Google Translate, allowing offline translation after downloading desired language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Лавините не са аномалия; стръмните склонове могат да задържат само определено количество сняг, а излишните обеми се свличат под формата на лавини. Проблемът е, че снегът е лепкав и ще е необходимо някакво действие, за да се смъкне надолу, а смъкването на снега може да задейства останали събития. Понякога първоначалното събитие, което действа като тригер, е слънчевото затопляне на снега, понякога допълнителни снеговалежи, понякога други природни явления, често причинени от човека.
mt: Avalanches are not anomalies; steep slopes can only hold a certain amount of snow, and excess volumes slide down as avalanches. The problem is that the snow is sticky and will need some action to slide down, and sliding snow can trigger other events. Sometimes the initial event that triggers the avalanche is the sun melting the snow, sometimes additional snowfalls, sometimes other natural phenomena, often caused by humans.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Кърито е ястие от месо или зеленчуци с билки и подправки. В зависимост от количеството течност, кърито може да бъде „сухо“ или „мокро“. Във вътрешните райони на северна Индия и Пакистан в кърито често се използав кисело мляко; в южна Индия и някои други крайбрежни региони на субконтинента най-често се използва кокосово мляко.
mt: Curry is a dish of meat or vegetables with spices and herbs. Depending on the amount of liquid, curry can be "dry" or "wet". In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, curry often uses sour milk; in southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, the most common use of coconut milk.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Трасето (или магистралата) на Южния полюс е път от 1600 км от гара МакМърдо на море Рос до полюса. Това е компактен сняг и пукнатините са запълнени и маркирани със знамена. Преминаването е възможно само със специализирани влекачи, теглещи шейни с гориво и провизии. Те не са много пъргави, така че пътеката обикаля дълго около Трансантарктическите планини, докато стигне до платото.
mt: The South Pole Highway is a 1600 km track from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is a compacted snow and the cracks are filled and marked with flags. The crossing is possible only with specialized tractors pulling sleds with fuel and provisions. They are not very fast, so the route circumvents the Transantarctic Mountains for a long time before reaching the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Влизането в Южна Африка с кола е удивителен начин за опознаване на красотата на целия регион, както и да достигане до места, които са встрани от познатите туристически маршрути. Това може да се направи в нормална кола с внимателно планиране, но 4х4 е силно препоръчителен и много локации са достъпни само с разстояние между осите на колелата 4х4. Докато планирате, имайте предвид, че макар Южна Африка да е стабилна, не всички съседни страни са. Визовите изисквания и разходи варират от нация до нация и зависят от страната, от която идвате. Всяка страна има и собствени закони относно това какви продукти за спешни случаи трябва да има в автомобила.
mt: 4x4 is a great way to explore the beauty of the region, as well as to reach places off the beaten track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning, but 4x4 is highly recommended and many locations are only accessible with a 4x4. When planning, keep in mind that while South Africa is stable, not all its neighbours are. Visa requirements and costs vary from country to country and depend on your country of origin. Each country has its own laws regarding what emergency supplies should be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Пренасяне вместо други хора - Никога не изпускайте багажа си от поглед, особено при преминаване на международни граници. Възможно е да се окаже, че ви използват като преносител на наркотици без ваше знание, което ще ви навлече сериозни неприятности. Това включва изчакване на опашка, тъй като кучетата, които надушват и откриват наркотици, могат да бъдат използвани по всяко време без предупреждение. Някои държави имат прекалено драконовски наказания дори за първо престъпление, те могат да включват присъди лишаване от свобода от над 10 години или смърт. Чантите без надзор са обект на кражба и могат да привлекат внимание от властите, загрижени за бомбени заплахи.
mt: Carrying for others - Never leave your luggage unattended, especially when crossing international borders. It is possible that you are being used as a carrier of drugs without your knowledge, which will get you into serious trouble. This includes waiting in line, as dogs that sniff and find drugs can be used at any time without warning. Some countries have draconian punishments even for first time offenders, they can include sentences of over 10 years imprisonment or death. Unattended bags are targets for theft and can attract attention from authorities concerned about bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Изпълнете дома си с богато кафе сутринта и отпускащ чай от лайка вечерта. Когато сте на почивка у дома, имате време да се поглезите и да отделите няколко минути повече, за да сготвите нещо специално. Ако сте готови за авантюри, възползвайте се от възможността да изстискате един сок или забъркате някакво смути: Когато се върнете към ежедневието си, може би ще откриете лесна за приготвяне напитка, която можете да направите за закуска. Ако живеете в град с разнообразна култура на пиене, отидете в кръчми или барове в квартали, където не ходите често.
mt: Fill your home with rich coffee in the morning and relaxing tea in the evening. When you are on vacation at home, you have time to look at each other and set aside a few more minutes to cook something special. If you are ready for adventure, take advantage of the opportunity to squeeze a juice or mess up some smoothie: When you return to your daily routine, you may find an easy-to-prepare drink that you can make for breakfast. If you live in a city with a diverse drinking culture, go to pubs or bars in neighborhoods where you don't go often.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Село Халдарсвик има панорама към близкия остров Еустурой и има необикновена осмоъгълна църква. В църковния двор над някои гробници има интересни мраморни скулптури на гълъби. Струва си да се отдели половин час за разходка из вълнуващото село.
mt: Haldarsvik has a panorama of the nearby island of Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard over some graves are interesting marble sculptures of doves. It is worth spending half an hour for a walk around the fascinating village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Въпреки че може да не ви е необходима виза за кратки посещения в някои държави като турист или по работа, отиването там като международен студент обикновено изисква по-дълъг престой от отиването като обикновен турист. Пребиваването в която и да е чужда държава за продължителен период от време, като цяло, ще изисква да получите предварително виза. В сравнение с обичайните туристически или бизнес визи, студентските визи обикновено са с различни изисквания и процедури за кандидатстване. За повечето държави ще ви е необходимо писмо с предложение от институцията, където искате да учите, както и доказване на наличието на средства, които ще са Ви необходими поне през първата година от Вашето обучение. Проверете в институцията, както и имиграционния отдел за страната, в която искате да учите, за подробни изисквания.
mt: Even if you don't need a visa for short visits to some countries as a tourist or for work, going there as an international student usually requires a longer stay than going as a regular tourist. Staying in any foreign country for a prolonged period of time, in general, will require you to obtain a visa beforehand. In comparison to ordinary tourist or business visas, student visas usually have different requirements and procedures for applying. For most countries you will need a letter of acceptance from the institution where you want to study, as well as proof of having sufficient funds that will be needed at least during the first year of your studies. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you want to study in, for detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you want to study in, for detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: През лятото ще трябва най-вече да се пазиш от комари, ако решиш да се разхождаш из тропическите гори. Няколко секунди с отворени врати, докато влезете в превозното средство, са достатъчни за комарите да се качат в превозното средство с вас, дори и да карате през субтропичната дъждовна гора.
mt: In the summer, you should mostly be careful of mosquitoes if you decide to walk in the tropical forests. A few seconds with the doors open, while you get into the vehicle, is enough for the mosquitoes to climb into the vehicle with you, even if you drive through the sub-tropical rain forest.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Сундарбан e най-големият крайбрежен мангров пояс в света, който се простира се на 80 километра (50 мили) от брега на Бангладеш и Индия. Сундарбан е обявена за обект на световното наследство на ЮНЕСКО. Тази част от гората, която се намира на индийска територия, се нарича Национален парк Сундарбан. Горите, обаче, не са само от мангрови блата — те включват някои от последните останки от великите джунгли, които някога обхващали равнината на Ганг. Сундарбан заема площ от 3850 km², като почти една трета от тази територия е покрита с вода и блата. От 1966 г. насам Сундарбаан е резерват за диви животни, и се смята, че в района вече има 400 кралски бенгалски тигъра и около 30 000 петнисти елена.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, which stretches for 80 kilometres (50 miles) along the coast of Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans has been designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This part of the forest, which is on Indian territory, is called Sundarbans National Park. However, the forests are not only mangrove swamps — they include some of the last remnants of the great jungles that once covered the Ganges plain. Sundarbans covers an area of 3850 km², of which almost one third is covered by water and swamps. Since 1966 Sundarbans has been a wildlife reserve, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: На света съществуват повече от 5000 различни езика, включително повече от двадесет с 50 милиона или повече практикуващи. Писаното слово често е по-лесно за разбиране от устното. Това важи особено за адресите, които често не могат да бъдат произнесени разбираемо. Множество цели нации владеят отлично английски език, а при още повече може да се очакват някакви ограничени познания - особено сред по-младите хора. Представете си, ако желаете, манкунианец, бостънец, ямаец и сиднеец да седят около една маса и да вечеря в ресторант в Торонто. Те споделят истории от родните си градове, и ги разказват с отличителните им акценти и местния жаргон.
mt: There are over 5000 different languages in the world, including over twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written language is often easier to understand than spoken. This is especially true for addresses, which often cannot be pronounced clearly. Many nations speak excellent English, and many more can be expected to have some limited knowledge - especially among the younger people. Imagine, if you will, a mancunian, bostonian, yamachanese, and sidnean sitting around a table and dining in a restaurant in Toronto. They share stories from their home towns, and tell them with their distinctive accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Автобусите тръгват през целия ден от междуобластната автобусната станция (зад реката), въпреки че повечето от тях, особено тези, които се движат на изток и към Джакар/Бумтанг тръгват между 06:30 и 07:30 часа. Препоръчително е да се закупи билет няколко дни по-рано, тъй като междуградските автобуси често са пълни. Повечето квартали се обслужват от малки японски автобуси Coaster, които са удобни и стабилни. Споделените таксита представляват бързо и удобно средство за пътуване на близки разстояния, като например до Паро (Nu 150) и Пунакха (Nu 200).
mt: Buses run throughout the day from the inter-district bus station (behind the river), although most of them, especially those going east and to Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 06:30 and 07:30. It is recommended to buy a ticket a few days in advance, as inter-city buses are often full. Most quarters are served by small Japanese Coaster buses, which are comfortable and stable. Shared taxis are a quick and convenient way of travelling short distances, such as to Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: „Тимбукту“, в съчетание с относителната си недостъпност, е придобил употреба като метафора за екзотични, далечни земи. Днес Тимбукту е беден град, въпреки че е превърнат в туристическа атракция заради репутацията си и разполага с летище. Беше добавен в списъка на застрашените обекти на световното наследство през 1990 г. поради заплахата от пустинни пясъци. Това беше една от основните спирки по време на PBS шоуто на Хенри Луис Гейтс „Специалните чудесата на африканския свят“. Градът рязко се различава от останалите градове в държавата, защото има по-скоро арабски вид, отколкото африкански.
mt: Timbuktu, in combination with its relative inaccessibility, has gained usage as a metaphor for exotic, faraway places. Today Timbuktu is a poor city, despite being turned into a tourist attraction due to its reputation and having an airport. It was added to the World Heritage List in 1990 due to the threat of desert sand dunes. It was one of the main stops on PBS show Henry Louis Gates Jr.'s "The Specials Wonders of the African World". The city is sharply different from the other cities in the country, as it has more of an Arab appearance, rather than an African one.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Параолимпийските игри ще се проведат между 24 август и 5 септември 2021 г. Някои от събитията ще се състоят на други места в Япония. Токио ще бъде единственият азиатски град, който е бил домакин на две летни олимпийски игри, след домакинството на игрите през 1964 г. Ако сте резервирали полети и настаняване за 2020 г. преди обявяване на отлагането на сезона, може да се окажете в трудна ситуация. Политиките за анулиране варират, но към края на март повечето политики за анулиране, основани на коронавирус, не се удължават до юли 2020 г., за когато е насрочена Олимпиадата. Очакванията са, че повечето билети ще струват между 2 500 и 130 000 йени, като обикновените ще струват около 7 000 йени.
mt: 2021 Summer Paralympics will be held between August 24 and September 5, 2021. Some events will be held at other venues in Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you have booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before the season postponement was announced, you may find yourself in a difficult situation. Cancellation policies vary, but by the end of March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies are not extended to July 2020, when the Olympics are scheduled. It is expected that most tickets will cost between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, with standard tickets costing around 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Торнадото е въртяща се колона от въздух с много ниско налягане, която изсмуква околния въздух навътре и нагоре. Те предизвикват силни ветрове (често 100 – 200 мили/час), които могат да вдигнат тежки обекти във въздуха и да ги пренесат в посока на движението на торнадото. Те се формират в началото като фунии, спускащи се от буреносни облаци, и когато докоснат земята, се превръщат в „торнада“.
mt: Tornadoes are rotating columns of air with very low pressure, which suck in surrounding air and rise up. They cause strong winds (often 100–200 miles per hour), which can lift heavy objects into the air and carry them in the direction of the tornado. They form in the beginning as funnels, dropping from storm clouds, and when they touch the ground, they become "tornadoes".
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Ако държавата, която ще посетите, влезе в бюлетина с пътническа информация, това може да повлияе здравната Ви застраховка за пътуване или застраховката за анулиране на пътуването. Може да искате да направите консултации и с други правителства, но съветите на тези правителства са предназначени за техните граждани. Американските граждани в Близкия изток, например, могат да се окажат в различни ситуации от европейците или арабите. Съвещанията не са нищо повече от кратко резюме на политическата ситуация в една държава. Представените мнения често са повърхностни, общи и твърде опростени в сравнение с по-подробната информация, която е достъпна другаде.
mt: If the country you are visiting is listed in the State Department's Consular Information Sheets, this may affect your health insurance for travel or your travel cancellation insurance. You may want to consult with other governments, but the advice given to those governments is intended for their citizens. Americans in the Middle East, for example, may find themselves in different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Consultations are nothing more than a brief summary of the political situation in a country. The opinions presented are often superficial, general, and very simplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
